title: Assemble Essential Survival Kit Items
brief: Build a functional survival kit with specific items covering all basic survival needs.
steps: Step 1: Include fire starting: lighter, metal match, waterproof matches, and candle.
Step 2: Add water purification: purification tablets and a small hand lens.
Step 3: Pack first aid: oxytetracycline tablets, surgical blades, butterfly sutures, needle and thread.
Step 4: Include signaling: signaling mirror and whistle.
Step 5: Add food procurement: snare wire, fish and snare line, fishhooks.
Step 6: Pack shelter items: solar blanket and knife.
Step 8: Add miscellaneous: condoms for water storage, chap stick.
warnings: Include a weapon only if the situation specifically requires it.
Test all equipment before depending on it in an emergency.
